Class OmegaBasedFilenameLengthLimiter

                      edu.umaryland.igs.idea.OmegaBasedFilenameLengthLimiter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DatasetVerifier
public abstract class OmegaBasedFilenameLengthLimiter
extends FilenameLengthLimiter

OmegaBasedFilenameLengthLimiter is an extension of FilenameLengthLimiter common to length-limited filename fields whose contents will be converted to filenames parameterized by user-specified omega values.

Written:

Copyright (C) 2007, Amy Egan and Joana C. Silva.

All rights reserved.

Author:
Amy Egan

Method Summary
private  int charsForOmegaValue(String omegaValue)
          The charsForOmegaValue method returns the number of characters the omega value represented in the specified string will take up in a filename, which may be one greater than the length of the string if a leading zero must be added.
protected  int maxCharsForOmegaValue()
          The maxCharsForOmegaValue method returns the maximum number of characters required to represent any omega value in the current state (including the value for the parameter "omega" and all vaues for the parameter "Extra omega values") in a filename.

Method Detail

maxCharsForOmegaValue

protected int maxCharsForOmegaValue()
The maxCharsForOmegaValue method returns the maximum number of characters required to represent any omega value in the current state (including the value for the parameter "omega" and all vaues for the parameter "Extra omega values") in a filename.

Returns:
the maximum characters necessary to represent any omega value in the current state in a filename

charsForOmegaValue

private int charsForOmegaValue(String omegaValue)
The charsForOmegaValue method returns the number of characters the omega value represented in the specified string will take up in a filename, which may be one greater than the length of the string if a leading zero must be added.

Parameters:
omegaValue - a string representation of an omega value, as entered by the user
Returns:
the number of characters in a filename that must be devoted to representing that value
